entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
